title: Best of The Herd for Feb 28, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Feb 28, 2020
description:
The Redskins should draft Tua with the #2 pick

Tom Brady is staying in New England

James Harden's style doesn't win titles

Who drafts you matters more than how good of a prospect you are in the NFL


Guest: Doug Gottlieb, Fox Sports Radio & FS1

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
